description: Nothing beats these golden zucchini fritters for a healthier snack. Paired with punchy sriracha yoghurt, these mighty morsels are irresistible.
name: Healthier Zucchini Fritters With Sriracha Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Spread zucchini evenly over a clean tea towel and stand for 5 minutes. Using your hands, squeeze excess liquid from zucchini. Place zucchini in a large bowl with flours, egg, parmesan, onion, parsley and garlic, then mix well to combine.
Using 1/4 cup of mixture per fritter, spoon fritters onto trays. Flatten slightly. Spray with oil and bake for 15 minutes or until golden and edges are crisp.
Meanwhile, place yoghurt in a small bowl. Add sriracha and fold until just combined.
